TopicTitle: A Song About The Old Forum

Articles.Content:
This is a little tune about the old forum, before it sadly changed.

-VERSE 1-

Logging onto the forums was fun, because there was always something to be done.

Now every page is full of users, asking the same question 'Why did it change?'

Making an account with a default avatar, the black Kerbal was pretty cool. But after it's been changed to a letter, tell me how that's apparently 'better'?

-CHORUS-

From reacting with faces to liking posts, the old forum was great at most. But now it's all been undone, so how can it be seen as fun?

-VERSE 2-

From a simple, easy-looking page, comes this new monstrosity of the modern age

Gone is the good old days, now been destroyed by modern ways.

So it makes me sad to think, that I'll now have to edit my links.

-CHORUS-

From reacting with faces to liking posts, the old forum was great at most. But now it's all been undone, so how can it be seen as fun?

-VERSE 3-

Logging out of the forums was sad, and now that things are bad. I really miss the old look, and it's a shame all the work it took.

 

DISCLAIMER: THIS IS MY OWN OPINION. YOU MAY NOT AGREE WITH SOME OF THE THINGS I HAVE SAID IN THIS SONG. I AM EXPRESSING MY REACTION ABOUT THE GREAT FORUM CHANGE OF 2017. HAVE A GOOD DAY.

 

 

 

Edited September 1, 2017 by The_Cat_In_Space
Nice song man  (although i disagree with your opinion kinda but no big deal)
I like the old one too.
wait? the basic avatar changed? what?

3 hours ago, StupidAndy said:

wait? the basic avatar changed? what?

It went away briefly, then came back.
